name: coemptyd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: sylibr(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, c1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), emptycls))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, c1), emptycls))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), emptycls))
-| wb(wceq(ccom(c0, c1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), emptycls))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, c1), emptycls))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), emptycls))
-| wb(wceq(ccom(c0, c1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), emptycls))

body.origin: |- wb(wceq(ccom(c0, c1), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), emptycls))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, c1), emptycls))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c1)), emptycls))

comment: Deduction about composition of classes with no relational content in common. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.)
